tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Tanuja has got such expertise that she handled my kid very efficiently when my kid was having viral fever and have high fever.Her explanation related to what diet kid should take during fever helped me to tackle the fever in one day with her efficient prescribed medicines..she doesn't push for antibiotic and gives only the required medicine to treat disease I will always visit even for vaccination

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Admitted our 8 month old for Diarrhea. **** **** ********** Nurse/sister did not know what medicine to inject after admission. Instead relied on parents. Nurse were not adviced by Dr Tanuja nor duty-doctor.  When we gave feedback at hospital, Dr. Tanuja called on our phone number and ill-treated us. 
Cash-billing process (without insurance requirements) took 4 hrs. Would not recommend Dr. Tanuja nor other doctors we consulted earlier nor Rainbow Hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ** * **** *** *********** ********* ****** * ******* *** ** *********. My child was suffering from loose motion and I shown to many doctors in Bangalore but nobody able to give proper treatment but after I consult to this doctor my child is fine now.
